metadata.title: CVE-2015-4142 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer underflow in the WMM Action frame parser in hostapd 0.5.5 through2.4 and wpa_supplicant 0.7.0 through 2.4, when used for AP mode MLME/SMEfunctionality, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash)via a crafted frame, which triggers an out-of-bounds read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4142` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hostapd - 1:2.4-0ubuntu3
wpagui - 2.4-0ubuntu3
wpasupplicant - 2.4-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1-0ubuntu8').
wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1-0ubuntu8').
